content.detailedDescription: I call myself ufologist, i have researched a lot about ufo's after i tell you my account i'll tell you something that you must read before it gets found. my account: i was in my car and i see a light at night. i look and it goes over the car. i got a good look at it before it was gone light and all. i told you what it looked like above 2 oval-like shapes connected by a bar and had a bunch of lights. then when it went past the roof it was gone. now im about to tell you something that has been deleted from a website not by the makers. on a ufo hunters episode about the landed ufo with a symbol. it was a circle with a triangele inside it, at the bottom left of the inside of the triangle is a dot and at the top left of the circle is another dot. put that up to  a map of the north america and the circle is covering the rockies the dots are at mt. mckinley and mt. whitney! this is where reptoid aliens are spotted in america but not limited to them. thank you for reading!
content.summary: In car, spot light, comes over, looks like 2 ovals and a bar connecting it, gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was not a witness, but have come across stunning photos taken by a third party that must be seen. i don't think the photographer knows what he/she has. for a fuller explanation and photo links:

http://rogersparkbench.Blogspot.Com/2009/02/ufo-fleet-over-chicago-feb-8-2009.Html

thank you
content.summary: About 19 disc shaped objects in sky, clear day, late afternoon.

content.detailedDescription: I have to speak to someone immediately i have a detailed photo of an unknown aircraft flying next to my plane enroute to korea. i have had this photo for some time and showed the photo to an air force  airman and he took the copy of the photo and would not return it. i have also been in direct contact with and enity  who not only presented himself to me but also has visited me in dreams and shows me things that will happen in the future. this photo is an daytime photo of an unidentified object that appeared on the photo after development of the film. because of the nature of wierd occurances and the airman directly telling me to not show the picture to anyone i have decided to come forward because he did not keep his word on returning the photo. he said that he  would make the image bigger using sophisticated military equipment and return it. the photo also shows 2 ebe because of the reflection of the window from the plane they appeared. when i studied the craft along with the images in the photo ihave for many years been in fear of my life. i was in the army for 10years and was certified as an armor crew member. i studied vehicle identification in fort knox, ky. i will only show someone face to face the photo. if you are trying to find the most solid information, this photo get alot of attention. the ebe that visited me was about 4' 0" and he wore a black skin tight suit. also had almond  shaped eye's. ever since this visitation. my clocks in my house and car would always make a static sound and the clocks in my house would flash 11:11, and 4:44 as well as my watches. the clocks would be unplugged and would still make the noises and flash 11:11. i have been visited by these things for some time now but was afraid of what people would think of me. please help me disclose this photo as well as the information that i have on what i have seen and learned. this is not an hoax i am for real. i was an staff sergeant in the army, a tank commander served 2 tours in iraq, an army recruiter. i am no longer afraid to tell the truth! if you are serious about finding the truth call me  or write me and i will get you this information. i will also submit to an polygraph. i believe i also know why they are visiting more now! god bless, and i hope to hear from you soon! by the way the reason i took the photo outside the planes window is because the cloud outside the window looked like a mans face as you will see in the photo. then i discovered the ufo after development.
content.shape: Blimp,  Cigar,  Circle,  Cross,  Disc,  Unknown
content.summary: Ufo/ebe photo.

content.detailedDescription:
We live in a rural community and have a long ��� mile gravel driveway with a large field along the whole right hand side of the driveway.  my three children (ages 3, 7, and 11) and i turned into the driveway and had stopped at the mailbox, which is towards the beginning of the driveway, to get the mail when we saw some extremely bright lights at the far end of the field.  it lit the far end of the field up as if it were a football/baseball field.  there were no beams of light, it was just ommitted from the lights on the craft.

i got out of the car and noticed it was moving slowly in a circular path.  it was triangular in shape, with 3 extremely bright white lights at each corner.  the edges of the craft glowed with a dull, yet still bright, silvery light.  it reminded me of the neon lights you see under cars.  in the center was an extremely large red light that was noticable but it did not appear to cast color around it or on the craft itself.  the craft appeared to be a dull silver/gray in color but i could not really get a good look at the color due to the bright lights.

it began to move slowly across the field and over the far opposite end of my driveway.  i grabbed my phone out of my seat and quickly took a picture as it passed over the woods on the left side of the driveway.  after about 45 seconds from when we first saw it and about 5-10 seconds after i took the picture it disappeared.  it did not shoot off, or leave any trails of light because of moving quickly, and did not go behind any hills or trees (there was nothing to obstruct the view).  it simple just disappeared.  my two oldest could verify the exact experience to my husband when we got to our house a few seconds later, so i know what we saw.  hopefully, when i download my picture to my computer at home tonight i will be able to zoom in and have it enhanced to better make out the objects shape.  right now, the picture looks like a massively bright glowing object/ball, and you can see some metal at the edges of the light.  as soon as i have the picture i will email it to your sight asap.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Triangular object, very bright lights, low to ground, circled around field, moved across driveway and dissappeared - took a picture

content.detailedDescription:
Last night around 7:30 pm i noticed an odd plane of some sort through my skylight windows of my family room. it cought my eye enough to look at it. it had rapidly blinking white lights that appeared to fly in a zigzag motion for a short period of time before darting off to the right, that is when i went outside with my husband to look at it. we noticed it was oval to disc shaped, flying fairly low, with all white pulsating lights almost giving it a spinning appearance. the lights seemed to be alternating on and off. it was silent.
it moved quickly and was out of view within minutes.
content.summary: Oval or disc shaped, white pulsating lights, zigzag pattern, silent

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home with my girlfriend and we saw a huge flash that was yellow at first then changed to blue/green. only lasted a few seconds. it was a clear night no clouds and the flash made no noise.
content.summary: Bright blue/yellow flash in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i was out looking at the unusual number of planes leaving white trails behind them. to get a better look went inside to get binoculars.
  while looking at where a plane just left a trail there i saw a small silver object. tried to see it with out binoculars but it couldn't be seen.

  i was looking at it for about five minutes and told husband to look but it was gone by the time he got the binoculars.

  i thought it was amazing to see it in daytime.  i have seen many at night. i was kind of shocked and excited at the same time.
content.summary: Round silver object.

content.detailedDescription: On nov 18th 2008 i was sitting outside (10:30 pm) feeding the deer apples in my yard, when i looked up and noticed the ball of light (again) above round butte. not wanting to disturb the deer, i stayed still and watched it .The light moved a little in that time . when the deer had their fill and left. i went in the house to get my camcorder the lens kept fogging up. so (video not possible)i decided to see if it would move when i went to the post office. and it did . seen it again over the railroad trestle as i was going home.Lost sight of it when passing between buildings. when i got home i did'nt see it anymore that night.This is the third time seeing the same type object and im a little scared of what might happen in a future sighting. i keep putting off reporting the sightings as they happen . you know how your family life takes priorities over other things.
content.summary: Ball of white light.

content.detailedDescription: It was september 12 2008 at 12;45 am, we were coming home from a trip to the willamette valley driving north over juniper butte my wife and i spotted a white ball of light to our left (west near culver). thought it might be a plane but as we neared the bottom it started to paralel us as we went farther .It was at 1000 feet or so above the ground. the wife suggested we stop , and when i got out of the car it moved north a little ways then it stopped, i got back in the car and proceded on and it started following us again . being scared i drove faster ,then drove slower to see if it would do the same thing and it did.The object stayed with us until we reached madras.When we arrived home i went in and got my camcorder but it stayed near round butte only briefly and headed back slowly were it was first spotted so i did'nt get any video.
content.summary: Solid ball of white light.

content.detailedDescription: Delivering news papers w/partner.Before we saw the lights both of us felt high static electricity. both our scalps and arms ithched. we were up on a mountain when we saw the lights. i was scared and drove away.My partner is a bio/chemist so she was curious. as we continued our route we saw a large akward deer (just one didn't walk right)going back and forth.Me terrified her rational i.E.Helicopters from air base.Possibly va hospitol we drove back.(6 min @ most)the lights were still visable (the static still continuing) we could see the va,the red lights from cell tower?Yet the bright lights were still visable from moon roof.Scared and excited we left and called another carrier to see if she was in the area. as i spoke to her that itching reaccured and each street light went out as we spoke.My car did not stall but my lights went dim.I saw a red sky above us.As thou sun rising or bright moon. then when the light left one by one lights turned on.Same way they went out.As i hung up phone my partner returned to the car.She put a paper on a porch. an owl (grey one color)flew out of thin air and landed on the porch roof of the house we delivered.What strange is it was staring at us and flew directly in front of my head lights.We watched for @ least 2 min. we were waiting to see if it was hunting or what.We left first. the static feeling followed us through the next 20 min of our route.The sky would light up.At another condo the spot lights on the four corners would turn off one by one then when the static lifted the came on the same way they went out. this has never happened in the four years we delivered papers. when we got home the sun was just rising in the east.Yet i saw the same red in the west.After that night i developed 4 huge boils on my skin.One on my thigh,one in the center of my chest,one near my lip, the last was on my side between my hip and breast. besides the one on my chest all were on my right side.My dog who is prone to allergies itched so terrible i made an appointment @ tufts dermotolgy.(not putting events together.By the next week me and the dog cleared up.We returned next week to the same location. we could see the lights of the va hospital and cell tower but not those bright lights. my partner will not go on record.She does concur on the matter.We both agree it was strange the whole night. we do not know what we saw.It was unidentifiable.We tried to take picture but the lights were to bright and the cell camera would not work.
content.summary: Many bright white lights. like a building in sky. when clouds over it the sky was red in west. not sun rise.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i am sorry for my english.
recently i was on caribbean on st. martin island. we took a taxi and made an observe excursion. i was there for first time, so i made a lot of pictures. also i made a lot of pictures of beautiful landscape on one viewing platform. only while looking throught the pictures at my computer i discovered the images of ufo. 4 spheres at equal distance from each other. 2 of them shined, the third- half shined and the forth had a steel colour. 
i found only on the one photo the imagine of ufo, but i made 3 pictures of the same place in an interval no more than one minute.
content.summary: The picture of 4 ufos on st.Martin island.

content.detailedDescription: Im a bad speller,if some one from mufon can call me @ the number i gave,and i will tell u my wierd story.
content.summary: Wierd flying things.

content.detailedDescription: Was at dinner in nelson, new zealand.  was enjoying the sunset so took 2 digital pics of it.  only later while looking at the pics on my computer i realized there was something else in the photos. this is when i saw the four lights.  the horizontal lines above are overhead power lines.
content.summary: Four round lights grouped together in pics of sunset.

content.detailedDescription: Basically my roomie was on his cell outside around 10pm and twice told me i should come see this,this was over a 45min. period.So after the second time i went out,there was lots of other soldiers watching.We are all aircraft techs.Watched for several minutes.Tried to notice pattern of its blinking lights,which were red.Noticed blue flame out the bottom,no pattern.No movement,no sound.Borden has no aircraft,next city that would is toronto,1 hour car drive away.Bordens near a great lake,20min drive to wasaga beach.As attached video shows,those who captured the ufo's,was over a great lake as the sound of the waves and seeing the shore in the video.Possibly the same lake near borden,im not sure the name of it possibly superior or huron.The video appeared within 2 months of me seeing the ufo.When we seen the video me and my roomie were like"thats exactly what we saw!" then almost a year later we were talking amonst a bunch of us describing it and some were like "bullshit" then others sitting near by were like "no man hes serious,we were out behind the shacks also",they seen them too!There are several aviation companies in toronto,its a major airport too so who knows,secret project? possibly.But if ufo are hydrogen powered it would make sense why the video and my sighting were over one of the great lakes.Possibly hovering long enough to fill up with water? however the way they took off on the video would easily exceed tolerable g forces for humans,possibly 10-25g's the way they just bolted!Originally i thought it was a helicopter,but they dont have light that flash like that and theres no downward exhaust.I was quite inquisitive watching intently and trying to soak up as much info i could and trying to burn the image into my mind.There is no light pollution out there.You can see more stars than ive ever seen,so clear.
content.summary: No noise, flashing lites to the sides,no pattern, bottom random lite like blue flame, exactly like attatched video clip.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window and saw the glowing thing,i thought it was a comet or astroid and it was closer then the stars but bigger then a plane because there was a plane right next to it so it was really big it was definitely in the atmosphere and moved really quickly to the right then down like it was coming to earth. i was kinda interested but scared too i just wanted to know what it was but it disappeared behind some trees across the road i haven't seen it since then.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking on waikiki beach i noticed a bright star-like light low in the western sky.  it appeared to be stationary, but was noticeably bright and steady with no flickering.  i stopped to chat with a new aquaintence who was sitting on the beach.  after some interesting conversation about hawaii and the state of the economy, i mentioned to my her that i had been seeing this light recurr during the past several weeks. it starts about 8pm local and disappears before 10pm.  she remarked that it was "just venus".  so i teased her into a bet that it would not be there after we talked for a while.  

after an hour or so, i checked that part of the sky and it was gone.  as i pointed out to her that it must not have been venus.  she remarked, "it must be back in waikiki again!"  curiously, i laughed and asked her what she meant.  she told me of an event that occured about a year ago where her and a group of friends were up on their condo's top floor.  she said it was around 3am and as they were talking, she noticed an object that was lower than their roof top recreational area, just floating in between some buildings.  it was only several blocks away.  as they looked down on it, she estimate it to be about 30ft across.  it  had an arced shape like you get when you place your index fingers together and touch your thumbs together, as she demonstrated the design with her hands. she said it had a small dome on top, was dull grey, totally silent, and just floated in between other high-rise buildings, finally disappearing between some buildings.  she said they watched for another 30 minutes, thinking it would fly up or out the waikiki area, but it was not seen again.
content.summary: Spot-light like.

content.detailedDescription:
Before bed i go outside and lay on a lounge chair with binoculars.  look around night sky at stars and satellights for relaxation.
i saw one part of the north sky flicker like the stars were disturbed.
i put my binoculars in that area and found a b-2 stealth bomber i thought.
i was darker than the background sky so i could easily see the shape. i looked for the telltale zigzag rear cut of the wing but it was straight!
then i noticed it had no lights on, i thought that's illegal. then i could see six elongated ports glowing a soft grey or bluish color underneath the leading edge of the plane, three on each side. 
it then sank in that i'm seeing something i'm not supposed to. i got a little scared my breathing quieted and i watched it go across the entire night sky. it came from the angle of las vegas heading towards phoenix in a perfect straight line and never made a sound. 
 
i always see jet planes go by at high altitude and you can still hear them and see a condensation trail. this was twice as big in my binoculars and twice as fast as satellights.  it was not a perfect triangle, it was slightly wider than long. and the corners were rounded slightly.
and there was no sound, that was the weird part, it looked like a toy.
toward the end where i couldn't no longer keep my view of it i found myself saying, " thank you, thank you" which was kind of funny. like i was thanking them for letting me see them go by.

told my wife and kid but they don't care.  but i do, what an honor!!

brian
content.summary: No lights, black triangle, no sound, flew straight path, north to south. wow!

content.detailedDescription: On this night my wife and i  were watching the night sky as we had patiently become accustom after three prior sightings we witnessed an oject enter the atmophere at a piont north by north west of our postion imediately it leveled moved accross the sky at a speed of what must have been at least 20000 mphit made a series of three curves as at the same time it seemmed to coolthe color upun entrywas as if the sun were comming out at night but as it performed the s curves it became darker it coereed the entire sky in a matter of 1 second then as to the west as we c ould see it shot straght toward the north at aspeed at least double of prior and out into space again
content.summary: On this night we were out on our trapoline observing the night sky we saw an object at an elevation of app 25 mi enter the atmosphere at 45 degrees n by nw and in 1 second at that altitude leveled off and covered the entire distance as far west as we co

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend at the time in the delta suites hotel, downtown toronto when i noticed a bright light that looked like a star but was much bigger and very close as you can see. it was impossible to make out the shape with naked eye but it was clear that this star like object was not supposed to be there so i took my friends camera and zoomed in for this shot. i knew it was something unusual and have still not figured out what it is.Some of my friends have seen the pic but we are not sure what it is so i posted it on that site. the object remained in place for more than 45 minutes and then slowly drifted towards to the right and out of site.While the object was in place i debated with my friend as to what it is and we both agreed that it was not a star and could not be any craft we know of.It is what it is...A u.F.O. that's to the best of my knowledge.
content.summary: Object captured over downtown toronto.

content.detailedDescription: at approximately 4:30 pm, feb. 5,2009, i was standing outside of work, having a smoke, tinley park,il.,noticed an object, very high, heading wsw to ene very fast. it was leaving a very small contrail, about width of my thumb held at arms length. covered from horizon to horizon in less than a minute. i thought this was a jet, still might be, but as of yet, never saw one so high and going so fast. flew very straight line, no deviation from speed or path.
content.summary: Object covered horizon to horizon in less than a minute.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on university avenue on my way to work.

i noticed a giant cube slowly floating high in the sky.

object appeared to be a giant floating cube in the sky

slow rotation and appeared to be hovering from west to east

i pulled over my vehicle feeling that my eyes were playing tricks on me in the early morning but the object was still a giant floating cube

lost sight due to some tree's
content.summary: Cube floating through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While having a smoke at home in the garden , i gazed at the moon for today being a full moon suddenly out of nowhere my eye caught a bright glowing orange light much like the shape of a star but with 4 points. it looked bigger than the planet which is visable almost daily in the night sky.

i first thought that it was a plane but there was no sound or gas trail. it moved towards the right from the moon. it's movement was steady in a straight but sightly curved line for about a minute with glowing amber light. it dipped slightly with a wobbled for about 2 seconds and started gaining speed upwards before disappearing into the sky and was not visable. i's flight pattern was not a all like a plane either.

it's not a commet for there were no tail it was'nt a shooting star either.

please verify if this is a ufo or not.
content.summary: A bright amber light moving towards the right of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: It has to do with the past time realm is being maletuadid cant spell to good call it ends time again sometime with in the next 7 years nothing is changinging
content.summary: Round white 25 feet dia. was there brighter ball going around ring.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out side looking toward west at the brightest star saturen ?
just to the left
content.summary: Very high alt lower horizion west toeast short flashes of light past stars.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed star through living room window,noticed was moving,stayed stationary but at times would drift up or down then go back,noticed no other stars due to high clouds,turned off tv and watched for over one hour in diffrent locations of house.Seemed to emit quick red beam of light for split second at times as moved then would be still for a few miniutes,i was looking south east from shreveport la,object was about 10 
oclock high on horizen.
content.summary: Star like, hovers, moves slowly, red/white flash.

content.detailedDescription:
Round with blue tinted lights rotating slowly and a light blue cross on the under side.

i left the town of wetumka,ok heading to tulsa at around eleven pm. i was about 2 miles north of wetumka on hwy 75 when my truck died as if it had no juice. i rolled to a stop and tried restarting my truck with no luck. i popped the hood and took a look, everything seemed fine. i got back in the truck and tried to start it again, it fired right off. i got back on the road and made it about a half mile where the hwy dropped down in a valley, when i got into the valley my truck died again. i pulled over for the second time and i decided to let the truck set for a few minutes thinking it would start back up if it set for awhile. i got out of the truck to have a smoke. when i got to the back of the truck i noticed the sky kind of glowing over the hill i just came down, i thought it was another vehicle coming down the hwy. but the vehicle never came, then the light stopped. then approximately 100 yards east over the hill i saw the glow again. i felt kind of strange at this point. i couldn't take my eyes off the glow, i watched it as it grew closer to the horizon. when the light broke over the hill an object slid over the trees to the bottom of the valley and stopped. the lights were not as bright now but they were a dull blue. after a brief stop the object moved about 200 feet in the air, it had a large blue glowing cross underneath.Then it began to move slowly east and with in a few seconds the object shot across the sky in a flash. it was the most amazing and unbelievable thing i have ever seen or experienced. i returned to my truck witch amazingly started on the first turn of the key and has not since died or acted up in any way. thank you for listening.
content.summary: Unmistakably bizarre and heart thumping excitement.

content.detailedDescription:
I had this photo on an "unformatted" floppy from my old sony mavica (set at 10x) and finally figured out how to get it off the disk.
 
you probably can not tell too much from the photo, but the picture was taken at 7:35 pm on december 01, 2008 in westlake, louisiana.
 
the red star like object first appeared to the sw maybe 20 degrees above the horizon and was traveling slowly to the north. 
 
after observing the object traveling north for 10 minutes, it was then located due west, still 20 degrees above the horizon.
 
at this point, the object started traveling due west (away from me) and it went over the western horizon 10 minutes later.
 
at first, i thought the "red star" was mars; that is until i noticed that is was moving. (in addition, the "red star" appeared to be larger and redder than a star or planet).

 
p.S when this object is enlarged on my photo viewer, it looks very much like the object observed as follows:

on 01/20/09, i went outside at 9:00pm to throw some grapefruit rinds on my garden compost pile. as i looked due west, i observed a large stationary flame yellow round object about 30 degrees above the horizon. the object had a smoky appearance to it in the totally clear sky and appeared to be about ten times larger than venus. as i dumped the grapefruit rinds on the compost pile the neighbors dog started a ruckus, so i went back inside to let him calm down. about ten minutes later, i went back outside to look at the stationary object in the sky and it was gone.
content.summary: Slowly moving red starlike object moving across the sky for 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my home in ripley co. and overheard on my police scanner (at approx. 9:30 or 9:35 pm) of a call reference to person reporting a blue flash in the western sky. i immediately grabbed my binoculars and went outside on my deck and saw this bright white star-like object to the west at maybe 10,000-20,000 ft. approximately. i watched it through binoculars(8x30mm) as it seemed stationary for about 5 minutes and still very bright, even with the full moon. i realized it was moving because when first viewed it was above my neighbor's house right next door then decended below it out of sight so i went towards the back of my home to regain sight of it. as it moved towards the west slowly (horizontally) it would dim somewhat to a pinkish hue. the futher away it moved it became smaller, dimmer and eventually decended below a treeline approximately 10-15 miles away. also, this object did not display any aviation lights.  duration of this event was about 10-15 min.  the odd thing about this (besides the object itself) was while i was out side i heard several cats whining and dogs barking in the distance like something was bothering them.
  after some hesitation, i called our sheriff's dept. at around 10:27pm to try to confirm this and they indicated a report of a blue flash in a town about 15 miles north of my location.
content.summary: Appeared to be bright star-like object moving towards the west.

content.detailedDescription: Suffering a headache, i went outside to get some air, and just happened to gaze up at the bright star in the west, which might be mars, i don't really know. as i was standing there, a much smaller light came into my field of view, and steadily moved across the night sky, passing the bright star. just past there, it dipped slightly, twice, then slowly raised to the original trajectory. the object was not flashing, as the aircraft that normally pass over do. it was much further up than any aircraft i've ever seen. this was not an airplane, helicopter, or anything else we fly about with. the object continued across the sky, until it was just too far away to see. i was surprised to see this object, but i stood there watching, half expecting it to start flashing like an airplane. it never did, and i watched until it was gone, then went inside, sat down, and told my husband what i saw. after an hour of reflection, i decided to let ya'll know about it.
content.summary: Star traveling with deviation.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when me and my fiance was studying for an exam for work. and behind him to his left shoulder a bright white light started to shine and i screamed out loud what the hell was that. at first i thought it was a plane but when i realized it was not moving,i quickly ran and grabbed my binoculars to see what it was. it is shaped like a sphere and very ,very bright. it seems to be fixed on one location. my fiance told me to grab my camera and start taking pictures. i took a total of 20 or so pictures. as we speak we are looking at it and it seems to be moving  west into the sky. it is currently  8:56pm and it is no longer visable in the sky.
content.summary: It was very bright and fixed to one location, within 10 min it seems to be heading west.
